attributes.action: ban Christianity in all its forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a well documented fact that all the supposed Christian festivals are in truth actually pagan festivals that were stolen during the early days of Christianity, in an attempt to force pagans to adopt the newly created Christian idea.

Is it not about time we returned these festivals to their rightful owners and show those who blindly follow the fabricated Christian faith the true path?
